title: Poroking gave me cancer
body: Anyone else think that Poro king is just the worst thing ever? I dunno I guess I just ain't into all this cute crap.

replies.body: I don't care much for poros either.. (though some of the icons look nice). It seems to me like one of those things whose popularity spawns from mass numbers of people mindlessly mimicking each other over.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyku,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1HRB9QfI,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-18T05:05:16.587+0000)
>
> Anyone else think that Poro king is just the worst thing ever? I dunno I guess **I just ain't into all this cute crap**.

BLASPHEMY!
